channel.title: Question
channel.description:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
I get this message when i try to compile my server. I have JDK 6. Any help? Thank you, Nubby.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @zomgs zomgs
item.description:
@zomgs wrote:

okey, make a new batch file called… compiler1.bat and put this in it:

@echo off
title compile?
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java
title Compile successful
@echo Compile successful!
@echo ----------------------------------------------------
pause

or

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac” *.java
title Compile successful
@echo Compile successful!
@echo ----------------------------------------------------
pause

Read full topic
